SELECT ci.collection_key as entity_key, i.type, i.identifier FROM identifier i INNER JOIN collection_identifier ci ON ci.identifier_key = i.key and (i.type = 'IH_IRN' or i.type = 'LSID') WHERE ci.collection_key IN

SELECT distinct on (c."key") c."key" collection_key, c.code collection_code, c.name collection_name, c.alternative_codes coll_alt_codes, c.homepage, c.catalog_url, c.description, c.number_specimens, c.taxonomic_coverage, c.geography geographicRange, concat(cp.first_name, ' ', cp.last_name) contact, cp.position contactPosition, cp.email contactEmail, addr.address physical_address, addr.city physical_city, addr.province physical_state, addr.postal_code physical_zip, mail_addr.address mailing_address, mail_addr.city mailing_city, mail_addr.province mailing_state, mail_addr.postal_code mailing_zip, i."key" institution_key, i.code institution_code, i.name institution_name, i.alternative_codes inst_alt_codes, i.latitude, i.longitude, inst_mt.value unique_name_uuid FROM collection c LEFT JOIN address addr ON addr.key = c.address_key LEFT JOIN address mail_addr ON mail_addr.key = c.mailing_address_key LEFT JOIN institution i ON c.institution_key = i."key" LEFT JOIN institution_machine_tag imt on imt.institution_key = c.institution_key LEFT JOIN machine_tag inst_mt on imt.machine_tag_key = inst_mt.key and inst_mt.namespace = 'iDigBio.org' and inst_mt.name = 'UniqueNameUUID' LEFT JOIN collection_collection_person ccp on ccp.collection_key = c."key" LEFT JOIN collection_person cp on cp.key = ccp.collection_person_key WHERE c.deleted IS NULL AND c.key IN
#{key}

SELECT c.key FROM collection c INNER JOIN collection_machine_tag cmt on cmt.collection_key = c.key INNER JOIN machine_tag mt on mt.key = cmt.machine_tag_key WHERE c.deleted IS NULL AND mt.namespace = 'iDigBio.org' and mt.name = 'CollectionUUID' AND mt.value = #{iDigBioUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT c.key FROM collection c INNER JOIN address addr ON addr.key = c.address_key WHERE c.deleted IS NULL AND addr.country = #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
